I stayed at **Iconic Hotel** last night, and it was a wonderful experience. 🏨✨
The property is brand new, with beautifully decorated rooms that are very well equipped. 🛋️
The pressure shower was amazing 🚿💯 and the bed was extremely comfortable 🛏️😌.

The staff were incredibly cooperative and supportive 👏🙌 – we arrived late at night 🌙 but they went out of their way to make us feel welcome.

The only small challenge is that the hotel is located a bit inside a residential area 🏘️, which might make it slightly difficult to find at first. But the team is very helpful and even sends people to guide you 🧑‍🤝‍🧑➡️, so don’t be discouraged by the surroundings.

Once inside, you’ll be pleasantly surprised 🤩.

✅ Overall, a truly pleasant stay. **Highly recommended!** 🙏🌟

A Perfect Stay at Iconic Hotel – Ahmedabad

From the very first moment I arrived, I felt I was in an exceptional place. The hotel’s location is excellent, just a stone’s throw away from the airport, which is a huge advantage for travelers. The property is modern, equipped with high-end technology, and truly rivals the best five-star hotels worldwide.

The rooms are spotless — unbelievably clean and meticulously maintained, as if brand new. Breakfast is rich, varied, and absolutely delicious, well worth waking up for.

What impressed me the most, however, was the staff: the very definition of professionalism and courtesy. A special thanks goes to the gentleman at the reception — incredibly polite, welcoming, and attentive, he made us feel like truly valued guests. This level of service makes the stay unforgettable.

In short: a hotel with no flaws whatsoever, my top recommendation for anyone visiting Ahmedabad. I will definitely return here on every future trip.

Iconic Hotel, located near Ahmedabad airport in Sardarnagar, offers modern, well-kept rooms with essential amenities for a comfortable stay. Its prime location makes it ideal for travelers seeking quick airport access, while the friendly and attentive staff ensure a welcoming experience. Clean interiors, reliable services and a peaceful environment make it suitable for both short business trips and leisure visits.

⭐ Hotel Iconic – A Comfortable Stay Near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, Ahmedabad ⭐
I recently stayed at Hotel Iconic, located near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, Ahmedabad, and I must say it was a truly pleasant experience.

The location is incredibly convenient for travellers, especially those catching early morning or late-night flights. Just minutes away from the airport, Hotel Iconic offers a stress-free and time-saving stay.

The rooms are clean, modern, and well-maintained, with comfortable beds, fast Wi-Fi, and all essential amenities. The peaceful ambience, despite being so close to the airport, is a big plus. The staff was exceptionally courteous, professional, and always ready to assist with a smile.

The in-house restaurant serves fresh, flavourful meals, and the breakfast spread was healthy, diverse, and satisfying.

What impressed me most about Hotel Iconic was the high standard of cleanliness, safety, and service. It’s not just a place to rest — it feels like a thoughtful, well-managed hospitality experience.

If you're looking for a reliable, elegant, and comfortable hotel near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, I highly recommend Hotel Iconic.

I recently had the opportunity to dine at Moti Mahal Hotel, and it turned out to be a memorable experience. From the moment I stepped in, the ambiance exuded a blend of traditional charm and modern comfort. The decor reflected rich Indian heritage, making it feel warm and welcoming.

The food was mediocre at best, but what truly ruined the experience was the absolutely appalling service. I’ve never come across such unprofessional, rude, and dismissive staff. It felt like they were doing us a favor just by acknowledging our presence. This place is a complete disaster—poorly managed, zero hospitality, and not worth a single penny. It was my first time here, and without a doubt, it will be my last. Avoid this place unless you enjoy being treated like a nuisance.

Very Poor Experience – Basic Facilities Missing & Unsafe Environment

I recently stayed at this hotel and, unfortunately, the experience was far from pleasant. I’ve stayed at many budget hotels before, but this one was particularly disappointing for the following reasons:

1. No Direct Control Over AC or Geyser

Every time I wanted to switch on the AC or geyser, I had to call or walk down to the reception. This was highly inconvenient, especially at night or early morning. I've never experienced this kind of restriction in any hotel.

2. Water Supply Issues

There were times when no water came from the tap, which made basic hygiene and usage difficult. This is a fundamental facility expected in any hotel room.

3. Dirty and Poorly Maintained Room Conditions

As shown in the pictures:

The window glass was dirty, broken, and covered with temporary plywood panels, making the room feel unfinished and unsafe.

The AC installation looked unprofessional, with wood and patches stuffed around it.

Worst of all, the elevator had a broken glass panel, which is not only dangerous but gives a very poor impression about safety and maintenance.

This stay felt completely uncomfortable and not worth the price paid. I strongly urge the hotel management to improve the infrastructure, fix safety hazards, and provide guests with control over basic amenities.

Until these issues are resolved, I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

Only plus point of this Hotel is the neighborhood area! Rooms are ok and bathrooms etc are clean and well maintained. The service of the staff is pathetic, they switch off the electric geyser main switch in the night! They also shut off the water supply in the night! Not recommended at all!!

1.	Cleanliness: Rooms are very clean, spacious, and well-maintained. Daily housekeeping keeps everything fresh.
2.	Staff & Service: The staff is polite, professional, and always ready to help. Service is quick and smooth.
3.	Location: Hotel is in a convenient location, close to main markets and transport facilities.
4.	Comfort: Beds are comfortable, amenities are good, and overall stay is relaxing.
5.	Value for Money: The pricing is fair for the quality and service provided.

👉 Overall, City Plaza Hotel is a great choice for both family trips and business stays. Highly recommended for anyone visiting this area.

We had a peaceful 1 day stay here on 28th to 29th June 2025. Since we called them directly after seeing the online listing, they informed we can check out anytime per our convenience. Room charge was value for money and hygiene is top notch in living area, common areas and the bathroom. It is near to railway station costing not more than ₹100 by auto. Staff is helpful and polite. Room service is available although we ate in the restaurant downstairs. Drinking water and extra mattress was provided with no extra charge (we had double bed with 3 adult guests). Ample autos ply in the vicinity. No elevator present but staff is on hand to help ferry luggage from and to room. Restaurant food tasted good both times we ate. Very convenient. Keep up the excellent work team.

we have a great stay at the good night hotel. the hotel is ideally located in the old town where many attractions are within walking distance and it is quiet as it is a little removed from the main street. the rooms are clean and pleasant and all the staff are very friendly. the breakfast is delicious with plenty of choice and in particular a very good continental breakfast. on our next visit to Ahmedabad, we will definitely return to this hotel

I recently stayed at Hotel Good Night in Ahmedabad, which is conveniently located in the center of the city. It’s easy to find transportation like autos and Ubers from here.

The hotel is clean and hygienic, and both the room and bathroom were very well-maintained. They offer basic amenities such as shampoo, soap, and oil, but a dental kit was missing.

The staff was very good and helpful, which made my stay pleasant. However, I would suggest improving the room's electrical outlets, as I found the charging plugs to be loose, making it difficult to properly charge my mobile.

Overall, a good experience with room for minor improvements.

Beautiful location, great service 24/7 they even help me and kept me updated booking the next bus and everything else involved.

I slept great and feel refreshed now

I recently stayed at  and was thoroughly impressed with the hospitality. From the moment I arrived, the staff was welcoming and attentive, ensuring every detail was perfect. The concierge provided excellent recommendations and was always available to assist. The rooms were spotless, comfortable, and well-appointed. Dining at the hotel was a delightful experience, with a diverse menu and exceptional service. The overall atmosphere was warm and inviting, making me feel right at home. I highly recommend for anyone seeking a memorable and pleasant stay.

I loved my stay so much that I came back a month later on a purposeful detour to a neighbouring state.
This place is a well-known hidden gem. Hidden in the sense that the narrow streets and alleys leading to the property from the main road don’t allow vehicles (only the bikes of local residents) which creates a peaceful walk from Dhal Ni Pol, despite only a short walk from Manek Chowk. It is also easy to grab a tuk tuk or uber or train from Dhal Ni Pol to anywhere in the city.
The place itself is pure tranquility, beautifully decorated and maintained, from quaint decor to vintage Haveli doors.
The bedroom is spacious with the most comfortable bed! And the bathroom gives ample space to wash and change with a separate shower and toilet.
The place is managed by two guys, Bansi and Dipak. Both are so helpful, flexible and friendly, they offered and made breakfast for me before my morning departure. Breakfast will leave you full and setup for the day and includes omelette, toast, paratha, fruit, juice, tea/coffee.
If I find myself back in the area again, I would stay without a shadow of a doubt.
Highly recommend!

It’s a 200 year old Haveli/ Home converted into a guest house. The family of the Haveli stays there as well. They provide room service, breakfast & also organises different cultural things like Sitar Concert, Gujarati cooking, Gujarati Language & more.

It has a quiet ambience & the rooms are quite descent for 1-2 days stay.
I loved Heritage house,it was spacious and welcoming. Our hosts were charming and informative. They generously shared their home with us over 3 days. I would highly recommend staying here

A very nice heritage house, clean rooms within the heart of the city, very much hospitable people. We stayed for 1 night and it felt that we were part of their family. The heartfelt welcome and the authentic homemade Gujrati food made the stay even better. We wish to visit here again.

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Heritage House in the Khadia area of Ahmedabad, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience. This beautiful property effortlessly blends history, culture, and hospitality, making it a true gem in the heart of the city.

From the moment I stepped into Heritage House, I was transported back in time. The architecture and design of the building perfectly reflect the rich heritage of Ahmedabad. Every nook and cranny of this establishment has been lovingly restored, preserving its original charm while offering modern amenities to guests.

Overall, I highly recommend Heritage House to anyone looking for an authentic and memorable stay in Ahmedabad. Whether you are a history enthusiast, a culture lover, or simply seeking a comfortable retreat in a charming setting, this place has it all. I can't wait to visit again and create more cherished memories at Heritage House.

We stayed in this beautiful heritage home for 3 nights and I will definitely come back

What a magnificent place, I can definitely recommend! This historical guesthouse is an experience on its own, located right in the heart of the old town of Ahmedabad. Even though the busy main road was just a 100 meters away, this place felt like a quiet oasis in the midst of the bustle city. The bedroom was beautifully furnished, had a great en-suite bathroom, a romantic balcony, a working A/C and everything was clean. The host was incredible friendly. Even though I had to wake up early because of a morning flight, the host made me a delicious fresh breakfast which he left at my rooms door at 06:50. Don’t doubt, go here!

Not an ideal place to stay longer than a day or two. It's more of a homestay than a hotel. We stayed for 3 nights and 4 days. Our experience was great on the first day and kept going downhill throughout. The owner doesn't stay near the property so the caretakers do the bare minimum to keep it running and nothing more. It's good for a one night stay but not worth it for a longer duration.

Cleanliness:
The bed and table tops were clean when we checked in. The washrooms were clean. But there's a lot of dust everywhere else. The carpet looks like it hasn't been cleaned in years. All the cupboards, corners were dusty. The water heating kettle had insects in it. The fridge is just s show piece. The caretakers don't clean the rooms, washrooms during the stay.

Comfort:
The stay is comfortable and the room is spacious. There are two rooms and we could hear the conversation of people from the other room and the caretakers loudly speaking downstairs late in the night. The place is closer to the market road where you can take an auto or cab.

Hospitality:
We were served complimentary breakfast. And we paid for dinner at 450/person. The first night the dinner was a good quantity but later it was barely enough. On the last day, the service was completely inexistent. We asked for hot water and had to go downstairs and get it ourselves. We asked for a breakfast, he said he's making it, we had to wait for more than an hour and go downstairs to remind him again when he started to actually do it. He didn't even clear the plates after we ate.

Other issues:
Some person named Mukesh at the building asked us to lie to Agoda customer support, cancel the reservation on it and pay him in cash for the same amount. When we didn't do it, he shouted at us in anger. We were charged 500/hr for a late checkout which we were informed of only after 12. I kept asking for a bill but we didn't receive any and the owner is unresponsive on calls or messages.

This place exudes a magnificent vibe, blending traditional old-style ambiance with modern facilities seamlessly. The AC and room service are top-notch, making it an ideal spot for a picture-perfect family stay. However, what truly sets this place apart is the host, Narayan Ji. His warmth and hospitality are unmatched. He goes above and beyond to make guests feel at home, preparing authentic Gujarati dishes that are nothing short of delightful. His humility, politeness, and willingness to assist with anything you need make him an integral part of the experience. Narayan Ji is not just a host but a gracious presence that elevates the entire stay. I can't recommend this place enough for a family getaway, thanks in large part to his outstanding service.

This is a really special beautiful charming place to stay! I highly recommend staying here, you won’t be disappointed. Just be aware it’s not that easy to find so just watch out for finding it. However, once there it’s a safe haven, peaceful and quiet. The caretaker is extremely helpful and will give you first class service.
The food was decent, not amazing but still satisfactory. The cleanliness of the hotel was well-maintained. The check-in experience was smooth and efficient. Overall, a pleasant stay at this hotel.

Good hotel but you have to ask to them for breakfast which is complementary in oyo bookings.  Staff is good and supportive but management is not so good. Clean room and washroom but washroom is not well equiped. AC is good and bedding and blanket is clean. You have to dial no 9 on the telephone to call room service.
Nice experince and easy to reach the hotel

The experience was worst , the photos that OYO site show and the reality of the Hotel is totally different. The room service was not at all good and the complementary breakfast was not provided as free meal but was charged differently. Anyone who is willing to visit Ahmadabad should not stay here.
Very very superior hotel. Nice behav and supreme facility.

The worst hotel i’ve ever stayed in- rooms are disgustingly dirty, no windows, bed sheets covered in stains looking like someone didn’t make it to the toilet. the walls are covered in greasy head stains and marks. hostile staff who do not make you feel welcome at all. On our last day the manager/owners were screaming and shouting at fellow guests right outside our room for 20+ minutes. DO NOT STAY HERE- the rooms are ridiculously overpriced for what they are. Dust everywhere and LOOK AT THAT BATH MAT- looks like a dead dog! find somewhere else to stay, do not recommend at all

Best location for business and other tours for stay... A dauble lift facility for all guests. Nice big and clean  bathrooms and big size rooms. Yes more ever the staff is very humble and soft spoken and no words for owner.. The owner is himself there to serve the guest better...

Great Stay and Amazing Hospitality!
I had a wonderful experience at hotel gulaall inn. The rooms were clean and comfortable, but what really made the stay special was the owner. He was incredibly kind, always helpful, and truly cared about making our visit perfect. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a comfortable stay with fantastic service!

Clean and hygienic. Moreover, Owner as well as the staffs are very well behaved and helpful....It is in Kalupur Ahmedabad Station area just 100 metres away from railway exit.

The decoration in this hotel is very much, but the condition of the rooms is not good.  Do not check the air conditioner before booking the room, otherwise the entire floor will be wet with its water.
expensive with respect to quality of rooms. far better deals can be found online.

The Savera Guest House is near to Kalupur Railway Station. The 2 bed small room cost Rs. 800/- for 24 hours. Hot water tap in bathroom, clean room. Take note that every room don't have attach toilet/bathroom. Suitable for 1-2 days stay.

The location of the dormatory is a top notch and the rooms are cleaned and good in condition, i can say that you can stop at that place without any problem. The location is just less than 400 metres from station and the place is quite good.

It is around 500m from ahmadabad junction. I reached it in around 3:00 am the place is open and the guy is providing me a bed in the AC hall. More than 30 beds are in the hall. The place is neat and clean including the washroom. Garments wholesale market is in walking distance. The hotel charges 350/- and 370/- per bed for 24 Hr. There are some restaurants around this place. I like the place and recommend it to all to stay.
